about_the_game:
Become Goon Brenn! Goon Brenn is a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual!

Haunt Sker Island with the infamous phantom black cat, Goon Brenn and become the beast of Sker Island!



The Goon Brenn DLC unlocks a new mask and exclusive items so that you can slay all those who dare to challenge you.

Torment Sker Island and all its inhabitants with the manifested spirit of Goon Brenn’s mask, wander among tombstones with the eerie graveyard as your background, haunt your friends with Goon Brenn’s exclusive in-game Cat’s Meow and show your belief in the folkloric phantom with the Goon Brenn Player Emblem.



This pack includes 4 new items:

Goon Brenn Mask

An Exclusive Premium Mask of the folkloric phantom beast, Goon Brenn

Graveyard

An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Graveyard

Cat’s Meow

An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line to haunt your enemies and friends

Goon Brenn Emblem

An Exclusive Goon Brenn Emblem Player Icon to show everyone who is the beast of Sker Island

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
